body_html: Thanks so much ,I got it~ 2018-07-11 11:25:51lexee <notifications@github.com>写道： normally you will see code like tf.app.flags.DEFINE_string(...) which defines some paras before training the model. Consider FLAGS as wrapperd argparse in tensorflow. Refer to [1] & [2] for more information. [1] https://stackoverflow.com/questions/33932901/whats-the-purpose-of-tf-app-flags-in-tensorflow [2] https://github.com/abseil/abseil-py — You are receiving this because you authored the thread. body_text:
Thanks so much ,I got it~

2018-07-11 11:25:51lexee <notifications@github.com>写道：

normally you will see code like tf.app.flags.DEFINE_string(...) which defines some paras before training the model. Consider FLAGS as wrapperd argparse in tensorflow.
Refer to [1] & [2] for more information.
[1] https://stackoverflow.com/questions/33932901/whats-the-purpose-of-tf-app-flags-in-tensorflow
[2] https://github.com/abseil/abseil-py
